auth.title: Credo - Login
auth.noAccount: Do not have an account yet?
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: We've sent you an email with instructions to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetEmailSentDescription: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
auth.passwordResetFailed: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
auth.invalidResetLinkDescription: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.passwordResetSuccessDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
auth.passwordResetFailedDescription: Failed to reset password. The link may have expired or is invalid.
auth.invalidFileType: Please select a valid Excel file (.xlsx, .xls)
auth.sampleExcelDescription: Download a sample Excel file with the correct format
auth.uploadExcelDescription: Upload your Excel file to import users in bulk
auth.dragDropText: Click to browse or drag and drop your file here

validation.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.identifierTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.passwordWeak: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
validation.firstNameTooShort: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameTooShort: Last name must be at least 2 characters

notifications.registrationSuccessMessage: Your account has been created successfully
notifications.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
notifications.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist.

pcOnly.title: Desktop Feature
pcOnly.description: This feature requires a desktop or laptop computer to work properly. File management and advanced features work best on larger screens.
